abstract: As part of our National Day on Writing celebration, seven Times reporters from a variety of beats discuss what they write, how, and why.
snippet: As part of our National Day on Writing celebration, seven Times reporters from a variety of beats discuss what they write, how, and why.
lead_paragraph: How did you become a reporter? What's the strangest or most interesting thing you've ever written about? How would you describe your writing process?

headline.main: Why I Write: Q. and A. With Seven Times Journalists
